CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 15, 1947, pg. 17, reads: "Courier Picture Page... Your Heart's Desire... Ossie Peterson."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ossie Peterson wearing dark long sleeved blouse, pleated plaid skirt, and necklace of two strands of pearls or beads, posed beside door with textured glass
